snippet: The state’s mine legislation is bad from an environmental point of view; it is even more shocking from an ethical viewpoint.
abstract: Editorial scores Wisconsin Gov Scott Walker and Republican-controlled State Legislature for approving world's largest open-pit ore mine; contends greater shock than environmental hazard is new evidence that operator Gogebic Taconite secretly gave $700,00 to political group helping Walker win 2012 recall election; says such unlimited secret donations pervert American politics at state and national levels.
lead_paragraph: The state’s mine legislation is bad from an environmental point of view; it is even more shocking from an ethical viewpoint.

headline.seo: Did Gov. Scott Walker Violate Campaign Laws?
headline.main: How to Buy a Mine in Wisconsin
headline.print_headline: How to Buy a Mine in Wisconsin
